selected_quotes: Mosquitoes? West Nile? Comparative repellency of 38 essential oils
Repellency effectiveness of essential oils against Mosquitos. Clove oil came up trumps.
Using essential oils undiluted repels 3 species of mosquitoes for 2 hours - 4 oils stand out in this
Comparative repellency of 38 essential oils ag... [Phytother Res. 2005] - PubMed - NCBI
Clove essential oil provides longest protection against mosquitoes, and smells great!

citation.abstract: The mosquito repellent activity of 38 essential oils from plants at three concentrations was screened against the mosquito Aedes aegypti under laboratory conditions using human subjects. On a volunteer's forearm, 0.1 mL of oil was applied per 30 cm2 of exposed skin. When the tested oils were applied at a 10% or 50% concentration, none of them prevented mosquito bites for as long as 2 h, but the undiluted oils of Cymbopogon nardus (citronella), Pogostemon cablin (patchuli), Syzygium aromaticum (clove) and Zanthoxylum limonella (Thai name: makaen) were the most effective and provided 2 h of complete repellency. From these initial results, three concentrations (10%, 50% and undiluted) of citronella, patchouli, clove and makaen were selected for repellency tests against Culex quinquefasciatus and Anopheles dirus. As expected, the undiluted oil showed the highest protection in each case. Clove oil gave the longest duration of 100% repellency (2-4 h) against all three species of mosquito.
citation.title: Comparative repellency of 38 essential oils against mosquito bites.

看到新聞標題，台南登革熱失控。很擔心，台南市是我從小長大的家鄉。因此就我專業，我也研讀了一些國際文獻，整理給精油同好們。

登革熱拉警報，到底哪一種精油對抗蚊子比較有效?相關研究多如牛毛，不同的病媒蚊有不同適用精油。但是針對台灣登革熱的病媒蚊，埃及斑蚊和白線斑蚊，總結文獻最有效的草本防護精油為，檸檬尤加利、檸檬香茅。其中檸檬尤加利對於蚊子的防護力長達六小時，與DEET化學防蚊液一樣有效。其餘對抗埃及斑蚊有效的精油，還包括香茅(錫蘭)、廣藿香、丁香、花椒。

希望大家可以多一個工具、運用草本精油大家來一起防治

wikipedia.title: Insect repellent
wikipedia.summary: An insect repellent (also commonly called "bug spray") is a substance applied to skin, clothing, or other surfaces which discourages insects (and arthropods in general) from landing or climbing on that surface.
